product_name: Patagonia  Merino 2 Lightweight Long Underwear Crew Top - Women's
long_description: Made with responsibly sourced wool from the grasslands of Patagonia, the women's Patagonia Merino 2 Lightweight Long Underwear Crew Top offers next-to-skin comfort and light warmth in cool weather.
short_description: Made with responsibly sourced wool from the grasslands of Patagonia, the women's Patagonia Merino 2 Lightweight Long Underwear Crew Top offers next-to-skin comfort and light warmth in cool weather.
